statements: SELECT * FROM TransportationInventory
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM TransportationInventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT part_id, part_name FROM TransportationInventory ORDER BY part_id DESC
SELECT * FROM TransportationInventory WHERE quantity = 0
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity, equipment_id FROM TransportationInventory
SELECT * FROM TransportationInventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_id DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM TransportationInventory WHERE equipment_id = 3 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity, equipment_id FROM TransportationInventory WHERE part_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransportationInventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY equipment_id, quantity ASC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM TransportationInventory WHERE quantity < 5 OR equipment_id = 2 ORDER BY equipment_id DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM transportation_companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE company_id = 2 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_companies WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_companies FROM transportation_companies;
SELECT * FROM transportation_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_id, company_name, location FROM transportation_companies WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT part_name, part_number, quantity, company_name FROM inventory_levels INNER JOIN transportation_companies ON inventory_levels.company_id = transportation_companies.company_id;

SELECT company_name, location, COUNT(*) AS parts_count FROM transportation_companies LEFT JOIN inventory_levels ON transportation_companies.company_id = inventory_levels.company_id GROUP BY company_name, location;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT * FROM transportation_company;
SELECT company_name, company_id FROM transportation_company;
SELECT company_name FROM transportation_company WHERE company_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transportation_company WHERE company_id = 1
SELECT company_name FROM transportation_company WHERE company_id = 2
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE price > 100
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM transportation_companies ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM transportation_companies WHERE location='New York';
SELECT part_number, part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM transportation_companies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity < 10;

SELECT tc.company_name, sp.part_name, il.quantity, il.log_date FROM transportation_companies tc JOIN inventory_logs il ON tc.id = il.transportation_company_id JOIN spare_parts sp ON sp.id = il.spare_part_id ORDER BY il.log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_company;
SELECT company_name, company_id FROM transportation_company;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location_name FROM location ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_company;
SELECT company_name FROM transportation_company ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, availability FROM equipment WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT part_name, equipment_name, quantity FROM spare_parts JOIN inventory ON spare_parts.part_id = inventory.part_id JOIN equipment ON inventory.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, quantity DESC;
